item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field." -- Niels Bohr

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I was gratified to be able to answer promptly, and I did. I said I didnâ€™t know." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Kites rise highest against the wind, not with it." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Darren Shan
item.description: "Even a minute of dying is better than an eternity of nothingness. " -- Darren Shan

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Live in the present, remember the past, and fear not the future, for it doesn't exist and never shall. There is only now." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Because you can't argue with all the fools in the world. It's easier to let them have their way, then trick them when they're not paying attention." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "Tact is the ability to tell someone to go to hell in such a way that they look forward to the trip." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Personally, I'm always ready to learn, although I do not always like being taught." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "It's the job that's never started as takes longest to finish." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "Confidence is ignorance. If you're feeling cocky, it's because there's something you don't know." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "I can't imagine what they're planning. But I can tell you two things. We won't like it, and it won't be legal." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "Trust me. I'm a genius." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Golnaz add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving." -- J.K. Rowling
